title: No escape
body:
“Creak, plup, creak...”

I opened my eyes. I was blinded by the darkness. Feeling around me, i felt nothing but what felt like sand. dust or what i thought was dust fell into my eyes as i heard the continuous sound of “creak, plup, pulp”.

Panic took over me as i didn’t know where i was. Fear paralyzed me. I lay there breaths ragged. I focused on where i was to try and calm myself. I forced myself to take deep breaths, covering my nose to stop the dust from entering.

I am in a coffin, I’m in a coffin, a...c..of..fin. I started screaming and banging my hand against the top of the coffin. I screamed for what seemed like forever. I screamed until everything went silent. Tears ran down my cheeks.

Every breath took everything out of me. I was running out of air. My time was almost up. I frantically searched for my phone in my pocket. Nothing. I closed my eyes trying to think rationally. I couldn’t. Anger filled my veins and i started screaming again. “Why me? Why me?” I screamed as i knew these were the last ever sounds i was going to make.

This is it. This is how it ends for me. No one will ever find me here. I am sure of it. I will just be another missing person’s case, without any answers. I dug my nails into a crack that i found. I could see a little bit of light as i pulled in the soil with my nails.

I heard footsteps crunch the leaves in the distance. I started screaming for help using my last amount of air that i had. “HELP! HELP ME! I HAVE BEEN BURIED ALIVE! Help.. m..e

I opened my eyes and i was once again blinded by the darkness. Barely having air to breath i felt my surroundings. I was still in the same place. I was suffocating now. Goodbye world. And with that, i took my last breath.

“In here, in here”, i heard someone screaming!!

“Are you sure?”

“Hello? Is there anyone in there?”

I looked back as my father, his eyes were disappointed looking down at me.

“Son, you’re hearing voices again...?”

I looked down at my feet. It sounded so real this time. But i didnt want my father to be disappointed so i shook my head and started to walk away. Telling him it was nothing.

The screams had sounded so real, too real... i couldn’t sleep that night. The screams kept replaying in my head. I got out of bed, took a shovel with me and ran to the forest.

I got to the same spot and started digging. Not long after my shovel hit a surface. I got down on my knees and dug my hands into the soil. There was a coffin... there was a coffin. Hesitantly i used the shovel to open the coffin. There was nothing but the bones of some small animals.

“I lost it again... i am hearing voices once again...”

Edit: hope you guys enjoyed. This was my first story in here ,sorry if its too short.
author: feverless
